title: Episode 179: The Whaley House
description:
We’ve got a haunted hot spot for you this week! Heading over to San Diego, California and diving into all the hauntedness that is the Whaley House. We hope your main takeaways from this episode are: never buy land that was once used for hangings, always set the house alarm as fast as humanly possible, and remember that it’s rude to blow tobacco dust in someone’s face! Thank you and goodnight. 
WHALEY HOUSE INFO/ TOURS
Donate to the Whaley house here!
